title: Can Corki get a VU?
body: I know that Riot stopped VUs, but Corki needs one so bad, and he doesn’t need completely reworked.  He just looks and sounds outdated as fuck.  I can only listen to him screeching “CONSIDER YOURSELF SPANKED NUGGET!”  and “THAT JUST GOES TO SHOW YOU’RE NOTHING BUT A WHISKEY DELTA!” for so long, while his blocky mustache waves around.

replies.body:
He is on the tier 1 list for a complete VGU, so yeah, he will get a complete visual overhaul at some point in the future.
It is just a matter of time.
Is there anywhere you can see that (the list)?

There is no official list you can look up directly, unfortunately.
But from time to time, Reav3 gives an update in a comment, telling us which champions are on the list and mostly discussed when they are going to decide the next VGU.

His latest comment about it, you can find [here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/Q30wxkKg-new-roadmap-reav3-can-you-give-us-an-update-on-the-tier-1-vgu-list-you-mentioned-one-year-ago?comment=0001).

Actually on the list:
{{champion:36}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}}{{champion:25}}
Isn't Morgana on the list too?  I thought they were planning on having a dual VGU with her and Kayle together (with a lore update as well).

You are right, she is planned to be a duo VGU with Kayle, I forgot her since she is not in Reav3s comment. Fixed it.

The thing is: like I said, it is not an official list, just comments from a Rioter. And this means there is a good chance that he is forgetting something in these moments as well and it is hard for us to figure that out (this was a special case since we know that Morgana is planned for the duo update).

So: don't take this list as 100%, there is always the possibility that something's missing, Reave3 is just a human too in the end.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Yeah I was just particularly caring about Morgana because I'm looking forward to her rework (hope they can keep her viable mid with it).
